text: Getúlio () is a 2014 Brazilian drama movie directed by João Jardim and starring Tony Ramos, Drica Moraes and Alexandre Borges. The stroy tells about the final moments of the crisis that led to the suicide of the then President Getúlio Vargas, in August 1954. President Vargas has to confront with the increasing instability of his government, after the trying murder of journalist Carlos Lacerda. ==Other websites== * Category:2014 drama movies Category:Brazilian movies Category:Movies about suicide
title: Getúlio
